headline: Devon Energy: Stop, In The Name Of Love (Maintaining The Rating)

headline: Devon Energy Is One Of The Few Growing Oil Companies
summary: Devon Energy boosts shareholder value with rising dividends, aggressive share buybacks, and double-digit production growth expected into 2025. Read more here.
